research_context.focus: Agent Communication Protocol (ACP) and Agent-to-Agent Protocol (A2A)

methodological_rigor.description: Scientific validity and reliability of the method

practical_implementation.description: Ease and feasibility of method implementation

research_alignment.description: Fit with ACP/A2A protocol research objectives

integration_potential.description: Ability to combine with other methods effectively

output_value.description: Quality and utility of expected research outputs

strength_levels.major: Significant advantage that strongly supports method selection
strength_levels.moderate: Notable advantage that supports method selection
strength_levels.minor: Small advantage that slightly favors method selection

limitation_levels.critical: Significant disadvantage that argues against method selection
limitation_levels.moderate: Notable disadvantage that raises concerns about method selection
limitation_levels.minor: Small disadvantage that slightly disfavors method selection

Method aligns perfectly with 20-week thesis timeline
